title: For the purpose of calculating the FSI for tenanted building, the entire area of the plot/layout inc
clause_text: For the purpose of calculating the FSI for tenanted building, the entire area of the plot/layout including Development Plan roads and internal roads but excluding the land under the reservation of public amenities shall be considered.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
